EmailTemplate.description: Opportunity Probability Updated by Sales Rep
EmailTemplate.name: Opportunity:Probability change notification for Channel Partner
EmailTemplate.subject: Opportunity Probability Change Notification for {!Opportunity.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Opportunity.OwnerFullName},
The Probability for opportunity {!Opportunity.Name} has changed to {!Opportunity.Probability}.
Thank you.
